00022 namespace Circal
00023   {
00024     MultipleMetaCircularAlignment::MultipleMetaCircularAlignment(
00025         const bpp::Alphabet* alpha) :
00026       VectorSequenceContainer(alpha), Alignment(alpha),
00027           MetaCircularAlignment(alpha), MultipleAlignment(alpha)
00028       {
00029       }
00030 
00031     MultipleMetaCircularAlignment::MultipleMetaCircularAlignment(
00032         const VectorSequenceContainer* input, const ScoringModel* scoreM) :
00033 
00034       VectorSequenceContainer(input->getAlphabet()),
00035           Alignment(input->getAlphabet()),
00036           MetaCircularAlignment(input->getAlphabet()), MultipleAlignment(input,
00037               scoreM)
00038       {
00039         std::cerr << "Building multiple meta circular Alignment... "
00040             << std::endl;
00041         GotohalignMultiple(input, scoreM);
00042       }

00046       }
